issue.title: [CI] [Python] Failure in docs build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5487](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5487). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This started failing on Travis-CI with Sphinx 2.1.0:
```Java

Warning, treated as error:
docstring of pyarrow.SerializationContext.register_type:0:Unknown target name: "type".
```

https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/540490192#L5631

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5487?focusedCommentId=16854575) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4455
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4455>
